message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe you would find valuable. I'm willing to offer it to you for $130. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within $120. Would it be possible for us to negotiate down to $120?
Hi Bob, I understand your position.  I can come down a little to $125, but I can't go as low as $120. I believe this product is truly worth it and will bring you a lot of value.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to lower the price. However, I'm still hoping to keep my spending below $120. Could we perhaps meet somewhere in between $125 and $120?
